title: Chocolate banana and peach loaf cake
ingredients: ['150g caster sugar', '120g butter, softened', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '1 tablespoon instant hot chocolate mix', '3 bananas, peeled', '1 large fresh peach - peeled, pitted and diced', '4 tablespooons milk', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '250g plain flour', '60g chopped walnuts (optional)', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt']
